wikitext.*:
'''Sean Arnold''' ([[30 April|April 30]], [[1941]]- [[15 April|April 15]], [[2020]]) was an English actor. His best known role was that of Chief Inspector Barney Crozier in ''[[wikipedia:Bergerac (TV series)|Bergerac]]''. In [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]], he played the part of [[Odo Proudfoot]].
